20110109005537.000|20110109005539.000|CC1|WHERE THE JOINT CARTILAGE IN THE
20110109005539.000|20110109005539.000|CC1|KNEE WEARS DOWN.

20110109005540.000|20110109005541.000|CC1|RESEARCHERS FROM TUFTS

20110109005547.000|20110109005548.000|CC1|HALF WERE ASKED TO PARTICIPATE
